com.ziroh.chabby.operationalResults

Class Result

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ziroh.chabby.operationalResults.Result
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuditServerResponse, AuthResult, ShareKeyResult, SigninResult, SignupResult

    public class Result
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the base class for all the results returned when an IO is performed with the device service

      short message description, generally short description of the problem.

      • error_code

        public int error_code
        error code. Success code is always 0

      • error_message

        public java.lang.String error_message
        specific error message. For all errors, this value is always failed.
